issue_body:
## Description

Add a timestamped line to the e2e-test.txt file in the `test-e2e-dump` directory.

## Approach

Edit the file and add a new line with the current timestamp.

## Tasks

See sub-issues for implementation details.

sub_issues.title: Update e2e-test.txt
sub_issues.description: Add a timestamped line to the test file

todos.task: Edit test-e2e-dump/e2e-test.txt and add a new line with current timestamp

agent_notes: Simple file update, no external dependencies
